location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter no.35 of 1825 to Lieutenant-Colonel Sir Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, from Major Robert Taylor, Political Agent at Basra

mods.abstract: The letter is an acknowledgement of receipt of Stannus's letter of 28 June 1825, and relates to His Highness the Pacha's unwillingness to comply to the demands being made by Sayyed Saeed [Sa‘id bin Sulṭān al-Sa‘id], the Sultan of Muscat and Oman.
